title: How to fix when pvp.net patcher kernel has stoped working

replies.body:
Patcher Kernel errors are usually caused by League not being assigned proper system permissions to run. League requires certain administrative privileges due to it interacting and relying on files and software packages outside of the League folder. I recommend working through our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) as a first step in solving this.

Let me know if that worked.
